tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Kajal has done scaling and polishing and also my root canal treatment . She is  very friendly, patient and very efficient in her work.During the treatment she makes sure that I am comfortable and explains the procedure in detail.
I am done with my root canal treatment and had to wait for the crown .I told her I couldn't go to work with half tooth missing, it was so nice of her to construct a temporary tooth for me and she did such a fine job that it looked better than the one which came from the lab.
Thank you Dr.Kajal for all the efforts you take and the care and concern which you show by messaging and calling after every to see if all is well.
God bless you abundantly.❤️
reply_text: Thank you so much for your heartwarming words! Patients like you motivate us to be better everyday!! ❤️

Dr. Kajal did my fillings in the most painless way possible. She was extremely friendly and caring. She did not hesitate during treatment planning and was extremely easy to talk to as well. 
I can barely tell the difference between my tooth and filling and that's exactly what I wanted so thank you to Dr. Kajal. Would definitely recommend everybody to go to her
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words :)

Doctor Kajal is such breath of fresh air and an absolute pleasure to work with. She is a thorough professional, knows her job so well, and i can without a doubt say that customer satisfaction is her prime objective. 

I was especially very touched when i received a call the next day to check if everything was alright with me, and it was such a pleasant surprise. 
 
Doctor Sonali is extremely good as well.  i am very happy with the service i received.

Thank you Doctor Sonali and Doctor Kajal.

review:
Dr.Kajal was an excellent dentist and has helped me improve my dental health immensely. She explained my issues to me in detail and helped me understand the root of my problems. I had root canals that were needed to be done since some time and Dr.Kajal made the entire procedure as comfortable as she could.
She even helped me with caps on some teeth and it was easier to maintain my dental hygiene with the help of her explanations. 
She is extremely professional and I couldn't be more pleased with the care and understanding I have received from her. She is extremely sweet as well! She even took some time out from her schedule and personally called me the next day to follow up on the pain from the root canal procedure.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words! It's reviews like yours that motivates us to do better work everyday :)

review:
I visited Dr Kajal last week because I was unhappy with the colour of my teeth. They had become extremely yellow because of my smoking habits. I explained to her how uncomfortable I was even while smiling. She was super understanding about it and she recommended I go for the teeth whitening procedure. 
My smile shade is almost 3 times brighter and I feel so much more confident about it now. Dr. Kajal really does have the best in mind for her patients and is extremely friendly too! Would definitely recommend her to everybody!
reply_text: Thank you for your kind and appreciative  words for your treatment! Glad you are more confident about your smile!

review:
I had the pleasure of visiting Dr. Kajal six months ago, and the experience was truly exceptional. With a wealth of experience spanning one and a half years in the field of dentistry, Dr. Kajal's expertise is evident in every aspect of her practice. What sets her apart is not just her professional competence but also the unparalleled soothing and comforting atmosphere she creates.

One of the remarkable aspects that keep me coming back to Dr. Kajal's clinic is the virtually painless dental care she provides. Her gentle approach has completely changed my perspective on dental visits. I now schedule regular clean-ups every six months, a habit she instilled in me with her emphasis on preventive care.

In a particular instance where I had a cavity in my front tooth, the meticulous attention to detail and precision with which she fixed the cavity not only alleviated the discomfort but also left me with a beautifully restored and confident smile. It's evident that Dr. Kajal is not just a dentist; she is a true artist in crafting smiles.

I wholeheartedly recommend Dr Kajal for her exceptional dental care, creating an environment where expertise meets compassion, making every visit a positive and reassuring experience.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words! Very grateful for patients like you! It motivates us to do better everyday.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Dr. Kajal is extremely polite and professional.  She explained the problem and its treatment very nicely in extreme detail. She made sure i was comfortable throughout the treatment. She emphasises on pain management and her attention to detail is commendable. Would recommend everyone to visit her for all your dental problems.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words :)

review:
I have always had a fear of dentists, but after visiting Dr. Kajal and her extremely approachable and soothing work method I'm extremely blown away . She explained every part of the procedure in extreme detail and kept giving me breaks whenever i got super anxious.
I can confidently say I'm 50% less terrified of dentists now and will keep returning back to her for a regular check up!
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words! Hope to make you a 100% less fearful in your next visit! :)

review: I recently visited Dr. Kajal Sanghvi for dental work, and I’m thoroughly impressed with her professionalism, kindness, and patience. As someone who is prone to cavities, I needed several dental fillings. Dr. Sanghvi not only made the procedure quick and painless but also took the time to explain each step thoroughly which made me feel at ease. Her expertise and compassionate approach make her an excellent choice for dental care. I can’t recommend her enough!
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words! Extremely glad to have made your dental experience better :)

review:
I was extremely scared to get my root canal done and visited multiple doctors for consultation. Dr. Kajal’s patient approach with assuring explanations for all my queries, made me go ahead to do my procedure with her.
The process was as painless as possible (one of my biggest fears) and I’m very satisfied with my experience.
I would definitely recommend Dr. Kajal to whoever is looking out for and dental services.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words! Extremely glad to have made your dental experience better! :)
